description:
Prince Moe`s plan is put into action, as our hero, Moemoe, and Yamada arrive as dinner guests. Meanwhile, Min-chan finds something surprising...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You`ll Do It, I`ll Take Off My Underwear Right Away
Kimi ga Shite Kureru nara Ore wa Imasugu Pantsu o Nugu!
Ninth Day as a Superhero "If You`ll Do It, I`ll Take off My Underwear Right Away"
君がしてくれるなら俺は今すぐパンツを脱ぐ!
